name: Quotes and Captions
description: Quotes and Captions has a huge collection of quotes for Instagram and Facebook, captions for Instagram. You can use it to update your Facebook and Instagram status or even share it with your friends. The quotes can also be saved and shared as beautiful images with custom backgrounds. It is completely free to use. The quotes are updated on a regular basis so you always have fresh new quotes with you.  There are a great collection of motivational sayings, inspirational quotes, success sayings which helps you to get inspired and also inspire others by sharing these on Facebook and Instagram. There is a amazing collection of attitude status are available.  There also beautiful collections of love quotes ,love messages ,romantic messages, love sayings and Flirty messages which you can share it with your loved ones.  There is a huge collection of custom wallpapers on which you can choose the quotes to apply. Everyone updates their social media status so frequently these days, that you are always in shortage of new quotes and captions to chose. We spoil you with so many quotes that you can share in your own beautiful way. Every wallpaper in the app has been carefully selected so that it looks attractive when you apply the status.  There are beautiful collection of cool photo captions for Instagram and Facebook photos are available which you can use to make your photo or story look attractive. These perfect photo captions attract more people to like your photos and follow you.You can also choose the photo caption related to your post on the social media.  The quotes and captions have been selected across 70+ categories so that you always have quotes to share according to your mood.  The Main Categories are:   Attitude quotes   sad quotes   Love quotes   Break up quotes   Motivational quotes   Friends quotes   Inspirational quotes   Alone quotes   Relationship quotes   Cool quotes   Moving On quotes   Sad quotes   Romantic quotes   Selfie quotes   Success quotes   Heartbreak quotes   Cute quotes   Funny quotes   .... and Many More  There also beautiful collection of wishes to send to your loved one on their special day.   Birthday Wishes  Anniversary Wishes  Marriage Wishes  New Year Wishes  Christmas Wishes   And there is also great collection of Good Morning and Good night messages you can send it to your dear ones.  Features:   Works without internet  Quotes for every mood  Easy to Copy and Share the quotes to your social media accounts  Share quotes as wallpapers with beautiful HD backgrounds.  New collection of Christmas and New year quotes,wishes and status.  Completely free to use. Download now and start sharing.
